biography.bio: Willy Millowitsch was born on January 8, 1909 in Cologne, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Donaug'schichten (1965), National Lampoon's European Vacation (1985) and Der Etappenhase (1969). He was married to Gerda Feldhoff and Linny Lüttgen. He died on September 20, 1999 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Willy Millowitsch

biography.bio: Eric Vaessen was born on October 4, 1922 in Aachen, Germany. He was an actor, known for Otto - Der Film (1985), Das rote Tuch (1966) and Caspar David Friedrich - Grenzen der Zeit (1986). He was married to Kerstin Sanders. He died on February 21, 2009 in Germany.
biography.name: Eric Vaessen

biography.bio: Waltraut Haas was born on June 9, 1927 in Vienna, Austria as Waltraute Haas. She is an actress, known for Mon ami le clown (1955), Premier avril an 2000 (1952) and The White Horse Inn (1960). She was previously married to Erwin Strahl.
biography.name: Waltraut Haas

biography.bio: Jupp Hussels was born on January 30, 1901 in Düsseldorf, Germany. He was an actor, known for Drei tolle Tage (1936), Der dunkle Punkt (1940) and Zimmer zu vermieten (1935). He died on April 10, 1985 in Großenhain, Germany.
biography.name: Jupp Hussels

biography.bio: Lotti Krekel was born on August 23, 1941 in Cologne, Germany as Hedwig Charlotte Krekel. She is an actress, known for Der Paragraphenwirt (1983), Der kühne Schwimmer (1967) and Um zwei Erfahrungen reicher (1976). She has been married to Ernst H. Hilbich since 2003.
biography.name: Lotti Krekel

biography.bio: Lotte Rausch was born on May 24, 1913 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany as Charlotte Bach. She was an actress, known for Unsere Nachbarn heute abend: Familie Schölermann (1954), L'homme perdu (1951) and Widower with 5 Daughters (1957). She died on March 11, 1995 in Offenbach am Main, Hesse, Germany.
biography.name: Lotte Rausch

biography.bio: Peter W. Staub was born on August 31, 1910 in Arbon, Switzerland as Peter Wilhelm Staub. He was an actor, known for Das Geld liegt auf der Straße (1966), Die große Starparade (1954) and Nacht der offenen Tür (1962). He died on December 25, 2000 in Kronbühl, St. Gallen, Switzerland.
biography.name: Peter W. Staub
